com.gv.cataloguer.catalog

Class ResourceCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gv.cataloguer.catalog.ResourceCatalog

  • public class ResourceCatalog
extends java.lang.Object
    class represents storage of references on resources from local catalog, provides CRUD methods to manipulate data from local catalog and add updates to remote data storage. Class is realized according Singleton pattern

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addResourceToCatalog(java.lang.String category, java.io.File file)
      insert new resource to remote and local catalogs according category
      void deleteResourceFromCatalog(java.lang.String category, Reference ref)
      deletes resource from remote, local catalogs and from list of references according reference object and selected category
      java.util.List<Reference> getCategory(java.lang.String category)
      returns list of references on resources from local catalog according category
      static ResourceCatalog getInstance()
      Returns single instance of class
      java.util.List<Reference> searchReferences(java.lang.String category, java.lang.String stringPattern)
      searches references of resources according string pattern in corresponding category
      void setBooks(java.util.List<Reference> books)
      sets new list of books references
      void setDocuments(java.util.List<Reference> documents)
      sets new list of documents references
      void setMovies(java.util.List<Reference> movies)
      sets new list of movies references
      void setMusic(java.util.List<Reference> music)
      sets new list of music references
      void updateCatalog()
      creates thread object @see ResourceCatalogInitializer for updating local catalog and references from remote data storage

                                                  java.lang.String stringPattern)
        searches references of resources according string pattern in corresponding category
        Parameters:
        category - - name of category of files
        stringPattern - - string pattern which will be used in searching references
        Returns:
        list of matching references

      • updateCatalog

        public void deleteResourceFromCatalog(java.lang.String category,

        deletes resource from remote, local catalogs and from list of references according reference object and selected category
        Parameters:

        ref - - reference on deleting resource
